articles.title: Trek to Yomi achievements are here, hope you like no-damage runs - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Trek to Yomi launches into Xbox Game Pass today, and we've just got the achievement list for the black-and-white samurai adventure. Multiple playthroughs, hitless bosses, all collectables... this one could be rather tricky, folks.
